channel.title: Log for viewgit
channel.description: Git log for project viewgit, generated by ViewGit.

item.title: Config: decrease default 'summary_shortlog' to 15. (Heikki Hokkanen)
item.description:
Config: decrease default 'summary_shortlog' to 15.
Heikki Hokkanen <hoxu@users.sf.net>

 1 files changed, 1 insertions(+), 1 deletions(-)

Thanks to Guillaume Storchi for pointing out it searches only in the master
branch.
Heikki Hokkanen <hoxu@users.sf.net>

 index.php            |    4 +++-
 templates/header.php |    1 +
 3 files changed, 6 insertions(+), 2 deletions(-)

item.title: Added a howto on Windows IIS & php-fastcgi. (Troy Hamilton)
item.description:
Added a howto on Windows IIS & php-fastcgi.

[hoxu@users.sf.net: Commit created based on an e-mail from Troy]

Signed-off-by: Heikki Hokkanen <hoxu@users.sf.net>
Troy Hamilton <troy.a.hamilton@gmail.com>
 doc/HOWTO-IIS-php-fastcgi |   35 +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
 1 files changed, 35 insertions(+), 0 deletions(-)

item.title: Allow project 'description' to be given in config. (Heikki Hokkanen)
item.description:
Allow project 'description' to be given in config.

If description is not provided, it's read from .git/description of the
respective project, as before.

Thanks to Troy Hamilton <troy.a.hamilton@gmail.com> for the idea.
Heikki Hokkanen <hoxu@users.sf.net>
 inc/example-localconfig.php |    4 ++++
 inc/functions.php           |    6 +++++-
 2 files changed, 9 insertions(+), 1 deletions(-)

item.title: README: mention example-localconfig.php. (Heikki Hokkanen)
item.description:
README: mention example-localconfig.php.
Heikki Hokkanen <hoxu@users.sf.net>
 doc/README |    1 +
 1 files changed, 1 insertions(+), 0 deletions(-)

item.title: Display doc/README when unconfigured. (Heikki Hokkanen)
item.description:
Display doc/README when unconfigured.
Heikki Hokkanen <hoxu@users.sf.net>
 inc/config.php |    5 ++++-
 1 files changed, 4 insertions(+), 1 deletions(-)

item.title: Set 'short_open_tag off' in example htaccess file. (Heikki Hokkanen)
item.description:
Set 'short_open_tag off' in example htaccess file.

This should make contributors spot less-compatible short open tags more easily.
Heikki Hokkanen <hoxu@users.sf.net>
 doc/example-htaccess |    1 +
 1 files changed, 1 insertions(+), 0 deletions(-)

item.title: doc/author: mention repo and gitorious clone URLs. (Heikki Hokkanen)
item.description:
doc/author: mention repo and gitorious clone URLs.
Heikki Hokkanen <hoxu@users.sf.net>
 doc/author |    6 ++++++
 1 files changed, 6 insertions(+), 0 deletions(-)

item.title: RSS: use gmdate() instead of date(). (Heikki Hokkanen)
item.description:
RSS: use gmdate() instead of date().

Thus, the RSS will contain dates with timezone +0000 instead of the local one.
Heikki Hokkanen <hoxu@users.sf.net>
 inc/functions.php |    2 +-
 1 files changed, 1 insertions(+), 1 deletions(-)

item.title: RSS: Use author_utcstamp for pubdate. (Heikki Hokkanen)
item.description:
RSS: Use author_utcstamp for pubdate.

Local time was used earlier, which caused the dates to be invalid (off by
timezone).
Heikki Hokkanen <hoxu@users.sf.net>
 index.php |    2 +-
 1 files changed, 1 insertions(+), 1 deletions(-)

item.title: Added some icons from Silk set by Mark James. (Heikki Hokkanen)
item.description:
Added some icons from Silk set by Mark James.

License is CC-BY-3, and should be DFSG-compatible.
http://wiki.debian.org/DFSGLicenses#CreativeCommonsAttributionShare-Alike.28CC-BY-SA.29v3.0
Heikki Hokkanen <hoxu@users.sf.net>
 doc/LICENSE                           |   12 ++++++++++++
 doc/author                            |    1 +
 images/silk/chart_organisation.png    |  Bin 0 -> 444 bytes
 images/silk/folder.png                |  Bin 0 -> 537 bytes
 images/silk/page_white_code_red.png   |  Bin 0 -> 587 bytes
 images/silk/page_white_compressed.png |  Bin 0 -> 724 bytes
 images/silk/page_white_text.png       |  Bin 0 -> 342 bytes
 images/silk/page_white_zip.png        |  Bin 0 -> 386 bytes
 8 files changed, 13 insertions(+), 0 deletions(-)
